item.title: Comment on The debate by jb
item.description:
Go watch some old debates from Kennedy and Nixon, and just compare their rhetoric, diction, vocabulary, demeanor, and answers to today's candidates. You'll see how far backwards we've gone pretty quick.
Or you could watch the Obama vs Romney debates. Man, the contrast is insane….in just 12 years.
The only winner last night was the Voyager probe speeding away from Earth at 17km/sec.

item.title: Comment on The debate by EdR
item.description:
Reply to Oskal:

One has the morals of an alley cat, the other has the cognitive capacity of one.

There's no reason to insult cats.

item.title: Comment on With immigration, perceptions matter more than reality by Picador
item.description:
Since Typer is such a fan of neighborhoods where he’s most likely to get murdered, he should move from his affluent DC suburb to Anacostia, where I used to work back during the crack epidemic. It’s got some great soul food spots!

… or is this just a column about how he enjoys slumming it for a meal of dark meat now and again, but prefers to leave the poor to suffer the day to day effects of crime and squalor?

Fucking gross.

Comment URL: https://marginalrevolution.com/marginalrevolution/2024/06/with-immigration-perceptions-matter-more-than-reality.html?commentID=160774315
